name: 王賢達
objective: 學習UV.IR.Proton NMR.C-13 NMR.2D NMR.MS光譜並由特性頻率或化學位移或質核比鑑定化合物．
schedule:
1.　　Ultraviolet spectrometry(2 wks)
2.　　Infrared spectrometry(2 wks)
3.　　Proton NMR spectrometry(2wks)
4.　　Carbon-13 NMR spectrometry(2wks)
5.　　Mid-term exam(1 wk)
6.　　Correlation NMR spectrometry(2-D NMR)(2wks)
7.　　Mass spectrometry(3 wks)
8.　　Solved problems(2wks)
9.　　Final exam(1wk)
scorePolicy:
Term performance and attendance(30%)
Mid-term exam(30%)
Final exam(40%)
materials:
Spectrometric Identification of Organic Compounds
(Robert M. Silverstein, Francis X. Webster, David Kiemle) 7th ed.
